data.message: Card Grammar Patterns from 30-card drill: (1) Structure: Container + Header + Content + Footer. (2) Badges: top-left or inline with title. (3) Price: large number + small period, baseline-aligned. (4) Data cards: Label→Value→Change with color coding. (5) Feature lists: checkmark + text, 8-12px gap. (6) CTAs: full-width bottom for conversion, inline for info. (7) Corner radius scale: 0=editorial, 8=neutral, 12-16=friendly, 20+=playful. (8) Shadow: none=flat, subtle=elevated, layered=premium.
